argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | axhil.1 | |- U = <. <. +h , .h >. , normh >. |
| 2 |  | axhil.2 | |- U e. CHilOLD |
| 3 |  | #P_df-hba | |- ~H = ( BaseSet ` <. <. +h , .h >. , normh >. ) |
| 4 | 1 | #P_fveq2i | |- ( BaseSet ` U ) = ( BaseSet ` <. <. +h , .h >. , normh >. ) |
| 5 | 3, 4 | #P_eqtr4i | |- ~H = ( BaseSet ` U ) |
| 6 | 2 | #P_hlnvi | |- U e. NrmCVec |
| 7 | 1, 6 | #P_h2hva | |- +h = ( +v ` U ) |
| 8 |  | #P_df-h0v | |- 0h = ( 0vec ` <. <. +h , .h >. , normh >. ) |
| 9 | 1 | #P_fveq2i | |- ( 0vec ` U ) = ( 0vec ` <. <. +h , .h >. , normh >. ) |
| 10 | 8, 9 | #P_eqtr4i | |- 0h = ( 0vec ` U ) |
| 11 | 5, 7, 10 | #P_hladdid | |- ( ( U e. CHilOLD /\ A e. ~H ) -> ( A +h 0h ) = A ) |
| 12 | 2, 11 | #P_mpan | |- ( A e. ~H -> ( A +h 0h ) = A ) |
